newsitem.title: USA: FTP Software CFO Warnock resigns.
newsitem.headline: FTP Software CFO Warnock resigns.

text.p: FTP Software Inc said Wednesday its senior vice president, chief financial officer and treasurer Jack Warnock had left the company to pursue other interests.

Warnock said his background and interests are more in line with an operation actively pursuing an acquisition strategy or considering raising capital through a public offering. He said he had no disagreements with FTP's accounting practices.

FTP provides manageable and secure infrastructure software products, along with essential applications and services. Its VIP Networks enables customers to extend their networks beyond traditional boundaries in a secure and manageable manner to encompass employees or associates anywhere.
